logset_id.description: The id of the logentries_logset resource.

name.description: The name of the log. The name should be short and descriptive. For example, Apache Access, Hadoop Namenode.

source.description: The log source (token, syslog, agent, api). Review the Logentries log inputs documentation for more information.

type.description: The log type. See the Logentries log type documentation for more information.

location.description: A location is for your convenience only. You can specify a DNS entry such as web.example.com, IP address or arbitrary comment.

name.description: The log set name, which should be short and descriptive. For example, www, db1.
